name: Gundren Rockseeker

personality.mannerisms: Energetic speech, taps fingers when excited, protective of maps and documents

background: One of three Rockseeker brothers. Discovered entrance to Wave Echo Cave after months of searching. Hired party to transport supplies while he went ahead with Sildar.

status_by_part.part1: Captured by Cragmaws in ambush, taken to Cragmaw Castle
status_by_part.part2: Prisoner at Cragmaw Castle, being interrogated
status_by_part.part3: Held by King Grol at Cragmaw Castle area 14, badly beaten
status_by_part.part4: If rescued, wants party to find his brothers and clear Wave Echo Cave

relationships.brothers: Tharden (killed at Wave Echo entrance), Nundro (prisoner in Wave Echo area 20)
relationships.enemies: Black Spider, King Grol, Cragmaw tribe

reward: 25 gp per character after rescue + 10% share of Wave Echo Cave profits once operational
location: Cragmaw Castle area 14 (part 3), then Phandalin if rescued
key_possession: Map to Wave Echo Cave (held by King Grol after capture)
